snippet: The data presented a mixed picture of the American economy, reflecting the storm’s aftermath as well as difficult budget negotiations in Washington.
abstract: ADP National Employment Report says private sector added 118,000 jobs in November, below expectations; Institute for Supply Management says its services index rose to 54.7 in November from 54.2 in October; data reflects aftermath of Hurricane Sandy as well as difficult budget negotiations in Washington.
lead_paragraph: The data presented a mixed picture of the American economy, reflecting the storm’s aftermath as well as difficult budget negotiations in Washington.

headline.seo: Storm Slowed Hiring in November, but Services Sector Grew
headline.main: Despite Storm’s Impact, Services Sector Grew
headline.print_headline: Despite Storm’s Impact, Services Sector Grew
